name: Khushwant Singh
bio: As the Tech Head at WebDrave, I am responsible for overseeing the workflow within tech teams, ensuring efficient communication, and managing project timelines and deliverables. My role involves aligning technical strategies with organizational goals, fostering collaboration, and driving innovation to achieve seamless execution of projects.

name: Puja kumari
bio: As an SEO Specialist, I focus on optimizing our website and content to rank higher on search engines. I research keywords, analyze performance, and implement strategies to drive organic traffic. My goal is to ensure our content reaches the right audience and enhances our online visibility.

bio: As a Content Strategist, I plan and create content that connects with our audience. My focus is on keeping our brand's voice consistent while engaging our audience acrossÂ platforms.

bio: I work as a content writer for WEBDRAVE . My professional skills include blog writing , article writing and descriptive writing. I am capable of inscribing impactful and impressive content .

name: Dev Dheer
bio: As a UI/UX Designer at WebDrave, I create intuitive and visually engaging designs to enhance user experiences. I create aesthetic and user-friendly designs that meet our clients' needs and enhance their brand's online presence.

name: Ankijit Roy
bio: As a Backend Developer at WebDrave, I specialize in building robust server-side applications using Node.js and Express. My responsibilities include designing scalable APIs, managing databases, and ensuring seamless integration with front-end systems. I focus on delivering efficient, maintainable solutions tailored to meet business requirements.

name: Rishu bisht
bio: As a Client Acquisition Executive, I focus on finding new clients through online channels like cold emailing and freelance platforms. I work to build strong relationships, identify opportunities, and drive growth for the agency by connecting with potential clients and offering solutions that meet their needs. My role is all about expanding our reach and helping the business grow through strategic outreach.

bio: I am a Frontend Developer specializing in creating responsive and user-friendly web interfaces. I focus on delivering seamless user experiences and collaborating effectively to build high-quality applications.

bio: A dedicated backend developer with a strong foundation in Computer Science. Experienced in building efficient and scalable web applications, with a focus on user-friendly solutions. Passionate about solving problems and collaborating on innovative projects to create impactful platforms.

name: Krish Koli
bio: As the Head of Client Relations, I manage and build strong, lasting relationships with our offline clients. I ensure their needs are met, handle meetings, and provide personalized service to make sure they have a seamless experience with our agency. My role is all about understanding client goals and making sure we deliver the best possible service.
